line.comment: * DO NOT USE ARRAYS AS RETURN VALUES. USE TABLES INSTEAD.
* NOTE: [DATATYPE_TABLE] is not recognized by X-Studio. Use "if table get size: table = $return" instead.

line.text: 'Manufacturing is a one way process. The ship must keep still while working. Resources will be lost if it gets interrupted.'
'Jump Beacons get unlocked after completing the Hyperlane Studies quest.'

sval.val: Only one order at a time.
Manufacturing is a one way process. The ship must keep still while working. Resources will be lost if it gets interrupted.
Jump Beacons get unlocked after completing the Hyperlane Studies quest.
DO NOT USE ARRAYS AS RETURN VALUES. USE TABLES INSTEAD.
NOTE: [DATATYPE_TABLE] is not recognized by X-Studio. Use "if table get size: table = $return" instead.
